Dialogue.Value: It was a simple request，,but you really saved me!,Thank you very much!
Ohoho.... Now I can roam,the Internet in peace.
To the girl who took my,request， thank you.
Thanks， big sis!,My sister really liked it!
Thanks to my improved,strategy， I won the,tournament! Thanks!
Thanks to your bug frags,I don’t have to worry about,my virus going hungry.
Now I’m going to hone my,skills so I can farm bug frags,on my own.
Honestly， thank you very much.
For cryin’ out loud!,I’ve had enough bad,experiences with women!
But thanks to you， my life is,peaceful again!,Thank you sooooo much!
To the girl who took my,request， I can’t thank you,enough!
Thanks to you， I paid off my,debt and got back on the,right track!
Thanks to you， we can use the,social media network again!
Thank you very much!
Thank you for your help in,apprehending the fraudster,misusing the board.
We will work twice as hard to,stop this from happening again., - NetAgents
I was able to grab some,amazing motion footage,from you!
This game will be a,masterpiece for sure!,Thank you very much!
My son got his lunch safe,and sound!
I’m sorry you had to run,around so much， but you,really helped me out!
I was able to prepare a great,gift.
It was the perfect help for,someone who can’t NetBattle,to hunt chips.
I’m off to the front!,That show was just what I,needed!
The girl who responded,showed considerable strength,and finesse.
I’m a NetNavi!
I’ll be sure to train my body to,be good help to my master!
I found the perfect flower to,give to my sister!
Uhh...,How do I submit this message?
I don’t think I found an answer.
I want to talk to that girl again.
Thanks to you，the president,can do their job.
They will also practice their,busting so this will never,happen again.
